Description: You throw a punch from the surrounding shadows, unavoidable by any creature. This move is guaranteed to hit for 1d6 + MOVE ghost damage, unless during the invulnerable stage of Fly, Dig, Bounce, Dive, etc. moves.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
